page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content:
CLUBS STANTON HARCOURT
{CRICKET CLUB }formed from local boys and men. Plays on pitch on outskirts of village. Matches against other villages. {BRITISH LEGION}club of ex-service people. Caring organisation for ex-service people, may deal with financial hardship, visiting and generally giving help. {WOMENS INSTITUTE} 30 members at moment. Caters for women of all ages. Programme of talks, demonstrations, visits. Meets monthly. {YOUTH CLUB}for young people 11 - 18 meets once a week. Various sporting activities - competitions with other youth clubs in area.
